content: will be sewn onto the finished granny square to make the stem & leaves first make a slip knot and place it on your hook chain 7 skip the first chain and sl into the following 3 sts sl into the next st chain 4 skip the first chain and then sl single_crochet and half_double_crochet into the stitches to make a picot sl in the next st from your starting chain and chain 4 repeat the picot instructions sl & chain 4 make a final picot sl into the base of the stem and fasten_off ©shaiyeh 2024 3 #stawberrypicnicbag #shaiyehdesign ssttrraawwbbeerrrryy ppiiccnniicc bbaagg decorating the squares sew your stem & leaves to the finished squares make sure your stem is pointing up toward the top corner of the square and catch both layers of fabric as you sew this is also a great time to add the seeds to your strawberries i recommend using seed beads/rocailles but if you would rather embroider feel free to use sewing thread held double and a needle that can fit through the hole of your beads to attach them to your strawberries make sure you sew through a crochet stitch not between them as the latter will make the beads sink through the fabric ©shaiyeh 2024 4 #stawberrypicnicbag #shaiyehdesign ssttrraawwbbeerrrryy 1 ppiiccnniicc bbaagg assemble the squares lay your squares out according to the grid 1 make sure your strawberries have their leaves pointing the opposite way for the second side below the dotted line so as to avoid them being upside-down in the finished bag i highly recommend temporarily attaching all of the squares at this stage - i use stitch markers through the corner chain spaces 2 fold your bag in half along the dotted line and so that the side with a row of 3 squares is the bottom layer fold the two side squares in half and attach to the corresponding squares on the top layer 2 ©shaiyeh 2024 5 #stawberrypicnicbag #shaiyehdesign ssttrraawwbbeerrrryy ppiiccnniicc bbaagg attaching your squares start in the middle of your bag and attach your yarn i recommend using the same colour for the seams and straps work through the back loops only and attach your squares using a single_crochet join work along the diagonal lines and when you reach the end of a diagonal on the side you re working on flip the bag over and work the same seam on the other side ©shaiyeh 2024 6 #stawberrypicnicbag #shaiyehdesign ssttrraawwbbeerrrryy cont single_crochet to the middle join 2 ppiiccnniicc bbaagg single_crochet 3tog by going into the corner space of the square you re working on the middle square and the next top attaching your squares square cont single_crochet to the next top corner 3 once all of the long diagonal seams 2 single_crochet chain 2 2 single_crochet in the corner space have been worked work the last single_crochet to the next join of 3 squares 4 two short bottom side seams and single_crochet 3tog the same way as
